name: Need for Speed 2
description:
Need for Speed 2 is a racing game developed by Electronic Arts Canada, Electronic Arts Seattle and Pioneer Productions. It was originally released in 1997. Electronic Arts published the game. Need for Speed 2 has a Metascore of 71, based on professional reviews. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Need for Speed 2 is available on PC and PlayStation.
It was produced by Hanno Lemke and Sam Nelson. It was scored by Alistair Hirst, Jeff van Dyck, Robert Ridihalgh and Robert Ridihalgh (Game Gear).
